turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello. I need to place a I need to place a Starbucks order for pick up at the store on North College.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a venti iced coconut milk with whipped cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a double chocolatey chip creme frappuccino.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: please say your order a bit slowly. what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a Double Chocolaty Chip Crème Frappuccino.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: venti iced with coconut milk and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me confirm before you continue.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you say double chocolate chip frapuccino?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: venti iced.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: coconut.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you want whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so a venti iced double chocolate chip frapuccino, with coconut milk and whipped cream, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: North College.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks in north college.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome, bye!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi.
